Welcome to the SQL-Injection Capture-the-Flag exercises

In this problem, you will try to login as user "bob" using SQL injection, without knowing his password. Bob is actually quite security savvy, so his password is a 64 character random alphanumeric string. Brute-force guessing is not the way to solve this problem.
